text: Amal Clooney has officially taken maternity dressing to glamorous new heights. The human rights attorney, who is currently pregnant with twins, attended the CÃ©sar Awards in Paris with her husband George, dressed in a custom Atelier Versace couture gown that must be seen to be believed.
